mapper.select: (select date,pv_count,visit_count,visitor_count,avg_visit_time,new_visitor_count,bounce_ratio,add_time from baidu_statistics where date=DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y%m%d') and site_id=#{site_id} ORDER BY add_time DESC limit 1) UNION ALL (select date,pv_count,visit_count,visitor_count,avg_visit_time,new_visitor_count,bounce_ratio,add_time from baidu_statistics where date=DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(#{date},interval 1 day),'%Y%m%d') and site_id=#{site_id} ORDER BY id DESC limit 1) UNION ALL (select date,pv_count,visit_count,visitor_count,avg_visit_time,new_visitor_count,bounce_ratio,add_time from baidu_statistics where date=DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(#{date},interval 2 day),'%Y%m%d') and site_id=#{site_id} ORDER BY id DESC limit 1) UNION ALL (select date,pv_count,visit_count,visitor_count,avg_visit_time,new_visitor_count,bounce_ratio,add_time from baidu_statistics where date=DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(#{date},interval 3 day),'%Y%m%d') and site_id=#{site_id} ORDER BY id DESC limit 1) UNION ALL (select date,pv_count,visit_count,visitor_count,avg_visit_time,new_visitor_count,bounce_ratio,add_time from baidu_statistics where date=DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(#{date},interval 4 day),'%Y%m%d') and site_id=#{site_id} ORDER BY id DESC limit 1) UNION ALL (select date,pv_count,visit_count,visitor_count,avg_visit_time,new_visitor_count,bounce_ratio,add_time from baidu_statistics where date=DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(#{date},interval 5 day),'%Y%m%d') and site_id=#{site_id} ORDER BY id DESC limit 1)
